name: PoliceCar
0:
”Alexa, open Police Car”
”Play Police Car”
”Ask Police Car”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: police car
des:
When you want to wake the family, play with the kids or trick your friends, a police siren comes in handy. 

Just say "Alexa, open Police Car" or "Alexa, play Police Car".

Say "Alexa, stop" or "Alexa, cancel" to finish. Note that you MUST prefix that with 'Alexa' due to the way Alexa handles audio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
